page.text: The reptilian warrior pants, her accountrements of war discarded and scattered around her feet as she blushes and sees you approach only to throw herself at you. choice.text: $You'll look sexy as a bulge, digesting inside me

page.text: The saurian chirrs and her tail curls at that, blushing as you tease her..and then, start to devour her. choice.text: $Mhmm you're delicious, and you look good on me food

page.text: The reptile lets out a moan at that, squirming around as she gets settled into your belly and flushes at the hot confines and the thought of her being the sexy tummy you're sporting now. You have devoured your prey in some unspecified, unelaborated on yet satisfying way.
